Top-3 Similar Questions: so_14641553: How to find the memory consumption of a particular process in linux for every 5 seconds
so_50678564: find application by killed process
Top-3 Scripts:
so_50678564: #!/bin/bash

mkdir -p "$HOME/ps_logs"

while true; do
    ps aux > "$HOME/ps_logs/ps_$(date +%Y-%m-%d_%H:%M:%S).log"
    sleep 60 # Logging interval in seconds.
done
